install.name: Virtual keyboard
install.author: Martin Podolak
install.description: This module adds a virtual keyboard to the input of your choice

param.name: keyboard_class
param.label: Input class
param.description: Determine the class of the input(s) you want to assign the keyboard to. This is most likely 'inputbox'. Note that the module must be active on the page where the keyboard should be active.

param.name: allow_resize
param.label: Allow user to adjust keyboard size
param.description: The keyboard includes a control that allows the user to adjust the size of the keyboard.

param.name: default_size
param.label: Default keyboard size
param.description: Five sizes based on font-size have been pre-programmed: 9px, 11px (default), 13px, 16px and 20px; corresponding to the sizes 1 to 5 respectively.

param.name: automatic_lang
param.label: Automatic language detection
param.description: The keyboard will use the lang attribute of each enabled form element in order to determine which keyboard to display. For example, if a text input contains the attribute lang=fr then the French keyboard layout will be automatically selected by default when the keyboard is invoked. If no lang attribute exists, or a compatible keyboard layout is not found, then the default or currently selected layout will be displayed.

param.name: icon_path
param.label: Icon path
param.description: Where the keyboard icon is saved.
